Headline: Southbound Temporary #54B South Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Reroute near Narragansett/Montrose

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at 35th-Bronzeville-IIT due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
